subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
Franchises
lead_paragraph: The Grizzlies are the only N.B.A. team to lose 12 consecutive playoff games, and they have doubled the league record for playoff losses before a first victory.
snippet: The Grizzlies are the only N.B.A. team to lose 12 consecutive playoff games, and they have doubled the league record for playoff losses before a first victory.
